ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: pre-treatment assessment or post-assessment
answer to screen question 8
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; -7 = N/A

ElementDescription: answer to screen question 9
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; -7 = N/A

ElementDescription: answer to screen question 10
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; -7 = N/A

ElementDescription: recurrent and persistent thoughts, urges, or images that are experienced at some time during the disturbance as intrusive and unwanted, at that in most individuals cause marked anxiety or distress
Notes: 1= absent or false; 2 = subthreshold; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported; -1 = Inadequate Information/Unknown

ElementDescription: Obsessive person attempts to ignore, suppress, neutralize with other thought or action
Notes: 0=Inadequate information; 1=Absent or false; 2=Subthreshold; 3=Threshold or true

ElementDescription: answer to screen question 11
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; -7 = N/A

ElementDescription: repetitive behaviors that the individual feels driven to perform in response to an obsession or according to rules that must be applied rigidly
Notes: 1= absent or false; 2 = subthreshold; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported; -1 = Inadequate Information/Unknown

ElementDescription: behaviors or mental acts are aimed at preventing or reducing anxiety or distress or peventing some dreaded event or situation; however, these behaviors or mental acts either are not connected in a realistic way with what they are designed to neutralize or prevent or are clearly excessive
Notes: 1= absent or false; 2 = subthreshold; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported; -1 = Inadequate Information/Unknown

ElementDescription: neither obsession nor compulsions
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: obsessions or compulsions are time consuming or cause clinically significant distress or impairment in social, occupational, or other important areas of functioning
Notes: 1= Absent Or False; 2 = Subthreshold; 3 = Threshold Or True; 4 = Mild; 5 = Moderate; 6 = Severe; -7 = N/A; -9 = Missing Or Not Reported; -1 = Inadequate Information/Unknown

ElementDescription: obsessive-compulsive symptoms are not attributable to the physiological effets of a substance/medication or to another medical condition
Notes: 1= absent or false; 2= subthreshold; 3= threshold or true; -7= N/A; -9= missing or not reported; -1= Inadequate Information/Unknown

ElementDescription: disturbance is not better explained by another mental disorder
Notes: 1= absent or false; 2= subthreshold; 3= threshold or true; -7= N/A; -9= missing or not reported; -1= Inadequate Information/Unknown

ElementDescription: criteria A,B,C,D, and E are coded "3"
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: during past month presence of obsessions, compulsions, or both
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported; -1 = Inadequate Information/Unknown

ElementDescription: during past month obsession or compulsions are time consuming or cause clinically significant distress or impairment in social, occupational, or other important areas of functioning
Notes: 1= Absent Or False; 2 = Sub-Threshold; 3 = Threshold Or True; -7 = N/A; -9 = Missing Or Not Reported; -1 = Inadequate Information/Unknown

ElementDescription: criteria A and B coded "3" for past month
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported; -1 = Inadequate Information/Unknown

ElementDescription: Age at onset of Obsessive Compulsive Disorder
Notes: 99 = Unknown

ElementDescription: current level of insight
Notes: 1= Good/Fair Insight; 2 = Poor insight; 3 = Absent Insight/Delusional Beliefs; 4 = Not Applicable; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: OCD tic-related
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: OCD with panic attacks
Notes: 1= absent or false; 3 = threshold or true; -7 = N/A; -9 = missing or not reported

ElementDescription: number of months prior to interview when last had a symptom of obsessive compulsive disorder
